Reviews.Title: Good TV, mine was defective, can't get another one
Reviews.Author: Lady A
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed...I am a big Vizio fan. Got this TV but the image went almost completely dark after a few hours. Light, dark, light, dark. Best Buy replaced it with an LED Vizio and I hate it. I want another one of these but now they are out of stock. I am so sad.

ProductInfo.Features:
TV Type: LCD
Screen Size Class: 42"
Vertical Resolution: 1080p
Maximum Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Screen Refresh Rate: 60Hz
ProductInfo.Name: Vizio 42" LCD 1080p 60Hz HDTV | E420AR
